This report provides documentation for the analysis of scRNA-Seq data of Dendritic Cells infected
with *Yersinia enterocolitica*. 


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
## Dependencies
library(dplyr)
library(scPipe)
library(ggplot2)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
        warning = FALSE, 
        message = FALSE,
        cache = FALSE
)

## Setting paths
path2project <- '/media/ag-cherrmann/cramirez/interaction_DC-pathogens/'
knitr::opts_knit$set(
        root.dir = path2project
)
```



```{r}
map.stats.df %>%
  mutate(plate=gsub('_.*', '', well)) %>%
    dplyr::select(plate, mapped_to_intron) %>%
      ggplot(aes(x=plate, y=log10(mapped_to_intron),
                 fill=plate)) +
          geom_violin() +
          theme(legend.position = 'none') +
          theme_classic()
```
